references.paper_title: On regularization algorithms in learning theory
references.reason: This paper provides foundational theoretical analysis of regularization algorithms, which are central to the study of spectral algorithms in the paper.

references.paper_title: Optimal rates for regularization operators in learning theory
references.reason: This paper establishes optimal convergence rates for regularization operators, a key theoretical result that underpins the analysis of spectral algorithms in this paper.

references.paper_title: Optimal rates for the regularized least-squares algorithm
references.reason: This paper provides a rigorous analysis of convergence rates for the regularized least-squares algorithm, a specific spectral algorithm widely used and analyzed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: On the saturation effect of kernel ridge regression
references.reason: This paper rigorously proves the saturation effect of kernel ridge regression, a key phenomenon discussed and extended to high-dimensional settings in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Optimal rates of kernel ridge regression under source condition in large dimensions
references.reason: This paper provides crucial prior work on convergence rates of kernel ridge regression in large dimensions, which the current paper builds upon and improves.
